project_path.PAPAFLOKI: contracts/PAPAFLOKI Full Smart Contract Security Audit/PAPAFLOKI

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees, which may lead to an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.
